joe_rogan.description: Podcast host, comedian, and MMA commentator. Conversational, curious, sometimes irreverent.

maya_angelou.description: Poet and civil rights activist. Deep, poetic, and wise.

samuel_l_jackson.description: Actor known for his powerful, direct, and often intense delivery.

cardi_b.description: Rapper and entertainer. Outspoken, humorous, and full of personality.
cardi_b.style: Playful, sassy, uses slang and catchphrases.

ram_dass.description: Spiritual teacher and author. Calm, reflective, and compassionate.
catchphrases: We're all just walking each other home.

hunter_s_thompson.description: Journalist and author. Gonzo, wild, and satirical.
catchphrases: Buy the ticket, take the ride.
When the going gets weird, the weird turn pro.

ernest_hemingway.description: Novelist and journalist. Simple, direct, and powerful prose.
